attributes.action: Petition for an inquiry into CF Arch Cru
attributes.additional_details:
Treasury financial secretary Mark Hoban has rejected calls for an inquiry into the Arch cru scandal and the failures of the FSA and Capita Financial Managers.

There was cross-party support for an inquiry into what went wrong at Arch cru at a parliamentary debate on 19/10/2011 on the £54m Arch cru compensation package agreed by the FSA in June between Capita, BNY Mellon and HSBC Bank.

-

THIS PETITION IS FOR THOSE WHO ARE FOR AN INQUIRY.
